search.title: Semiconductor industry
search.snippet: The semiconductor industry is the aggregate of companies engaged in the design and fabrication of semiconductors and semiconductor devices, such as transistors

search.title: Semiconductor industry in China
search.snippet: semiconductor industry, including integrated circuit design and manufacturing, forms a major part of mainland China's information technology industry

search.title: Semiconductor industry in Taiwan
